title: 如何设置无法丢弃物品
author: Shi_Xz
txt_content: 也不是说无法丢弃，反正就是丢了之后还没落地就立即返回背包。

replies.author: Shi_Xz
⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
execute as @a at @s positioned ~ ~1.319999992847443 ~ as @e[type=item,distance=..0.1] run data merge entity @s {NoGravity:1b,Age:-32768,PickupDelay:32767,Motion:[0.0d,0.0d,0.0d],Invulnerable:1b}复制代码测试...


1.12  ↓  应该可以...
/execute @a ~ ~1.319999992847443 ~ entitydata @e[type=item,r=0.1] {PickupDelay:0}复制代码

replies.author: _Rainbow_
replies.txt_content: 直接给物品弄一个绑定诅咒不好吗
